summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of BISI Engineering website. All 10 pages load correctly with green (#22C55E) color scheme. Navigation, dropdown menus, filters, lightbox, contact form, and mobile responsiveness all working correctly. No orange (#FF5A1F) colors visible on any active pages.

issues: Unused components in /app/frontend/src/components/ (CTASection.jsx, ServicesSection.jsx, Hero.jsx, etc.) still contain orange (#FF5A1F) color references. These are NOT used in the app but should be cleaned up for code hygiene.

action_items: OPTIONAL: Clean up unused components with orange colors in /app/frontend/src/components/ (CTASection.jsx, ServicesSection.jsx, Hero.jsx, TestimonialsSection.jsx, FocusSection.jsx, ClientsSection.jsx, AboutSection.jsx, PortfolioSection.jsx, animations/InteractiveAnimations.jsx)
critical_code_review_comments: Unused legacy components with orange colors exist but don't affect the live application
All active page components correctly use green (#22C55E) color scheme
Good use of framer-motion for animations
Proper responsive design with mobile hamburger menu
seed_data_creation: None - all data is mocked in /app/frontend/src/data/mock.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 10 pages tested and working: Home, About, Services, Projects, Team, Certifications, Clients, Gallery, Testimonials, Contact. Green color scheme (#22C55E) applied correctly. Mobile responsiveness verified. Contact form functional. Gallery lightbox working. Project/Gallery filters working. About dropdown navigation working.
